h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Elder Amourworm
content: If you find yourself having trouble avoiding getting poisoned, consider using the Pillar Stance to boost yourself up off the ground.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Middle Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Elder Amourworm'.
The content is as follows:
If you find yourself having trouble avoiding getting poisoned, consider using the Pillar Stance to boost yourself up off the ground.
